snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin has admitted that some of his most famous news media adventures with wildlife have been staged, but noted they drew attention to conservation.
abstract: Russian President Vladimir V Putin admits that some of his most famous wildlife adventures were staged for the news media, but notes that they drew attention to conservation.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin has admitted that some of his most famous news media adventures with wildlife have been staged, but noted they drew attention to conservation.

headline.main: Russia: Putin Acknowledges ‘Excesses’ in His Macho Televised Adventures
headline.print_headline: Russia: Putin Acknowledges ‘Excesses’ In His Macho Televised Adventures
